content: kudzu kerchief this pattern was created as a gentle and approachable introduction to lace knitting as the kerchief gets larger the space between the lace row becomes longer so you can knit this as small or as large as you like by continuing as the pattern indicates materials size us 3 32 circular needles approx 150 yards of fingering weight yarn 39 grams stitch markers yarn needle abbreviations k=knit k2tog=knit 2 together knit the next p=purl 2 stitches on the left-hand needle m1r=make 1 right insert the left- together through the front legs hand needle under the bar between ssk= slip slip knit slip 1st stitch the stitches on your left and right on left-hand needle as if to knit slip needles from back to front knit this 2nd stitch on left-hand needle as if to bar through the front loop knit slide the left-hand needle into m1l=make 1 left insert the left- the front legs of both stitches wrap hand needle under the bar between yarn around right hand needle and the stitches on your left and right pull yarn through both back legs of needles from front to back knit this stitches bar through the back loop ws= wrong side pm= place stitch marker rs= right side sm=slip_stitch marker yo=yarnover bring yarn to the front of work and over the right-hand needle work next stitch according to pattern instructions instructions set up row cast on 3 stitches k1 m1r k1 m1l k1 k2 p1 k2 k2 m1r k1 m1l k2 k2 p3 k2 k2 m1r k3 m1l k2 k2 p5 k2 k2 pm m1r k2 m1r pm k1 pm m1l k2 m1l pm k2 pattern lace section 1 row 1 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches k2 row 2 rs k2 sm m1r k to next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to next marker m1l sm k2 row 3 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches k2 row 4 rs k2 sm m1r *yo k2tog repeat from * to next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l *ssk yo repeat from * to next marker m1l sm k2 row 5 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches k2 row 6 rs k2 sm m1r *yo k2tog repeat from * to next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l *ssk yo repeat from * to next marker m1l sm k2 row 7 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches k2 lace section 2 row 8 rs k2 sm m1r k to next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to next marker m1l sm k2 row 9 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches k2 row 10 rs k2 sm m1r k to next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to next marker m1l sm k2 row 11 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches k2 row 12 rs k2 sm m1r k to next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l k to next marker m1l sm k2 row 13 ws k2 p until last 2 stitches
